summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of ARCHIVIO 1937 educational website about Soviet totalitarianism. All 13 pages tested successfully with full backend API integration.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with proper title and navigation button
APRI IL DOSSIER button navigates to /pravda correctly
Navigation menu with CAPITOLI dropdown functions properly
All navigation links work (PRAVDA, CINEMA, GULAG, TEST)
Pravda page displays flip cards comparing propaganda vs reality
Cinema page loads with video analysis cards
Cronologia timeline shows expandable historical items
Quiz functionality works end-to-end with 3 questions
Quiz calculates correct results (heroic=Fucilato, prudent=Gulag, informer=Sopravvissuto)
Conclusione page shows final statistics and bibliography
All 6 backend API endpoints return correct responses
